GeDBIT.mapreduce.app

类 QueryVPIndexMR

  • java.lang.Object
    • GeDBIT.mapreduce.app.QueryVPIndexMR

  • public class QueryVPIndexMR
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a utility class to query a VPIndex. It, taking command line parameters, runs a set of query on the given index and compute the average performance. main function to evaluate the query performance of an Index The eveluation is done by run a set of query on the Index, and compute the average performance statistics, such as number of distance calculation, number of index node visited (#I/O), and search time. The command line interface to bulkload one Index, or a series of Indexes for scalability study. -d [name of index, should be a prefix of the actual file name containing serialized database] -q [query file name] -f [offset of first query to be used in the query file, start from 0, inclusive, default 0] -l [offset of last query to be used in the query file, exclusive, default 1] -i [minimum search radius, default 0] -a [maximum search radius, default 10] -s [step size for search radii, default 1] -t [data type, "vector", "protein", "dna", "image", "mass"] -p [length of the path distance list] -v [1 if search results are to be verified against a linear scan and 0 otherwise, default 0] -g [debug level, default 0] -frag [fragment length, only meaningful for Sequences] -dim [dimension of vector data to load, only meaningful for DoubleVectors] -res [output results to the given filename] The Metric is hardcoded for each give data type.
    版本:
    2006.06.27
    作者:
    Rui Mao, Willard

    • 构造器详细资料

      • QueryVPIndexMR

        public QueryVPIndexMR(Index index,
              TableMR query,
              double minRadius,
              double maxRadius,
              double step,
              boolean verify,
              java.util.logging.Level debug,
              int pathLength,
              int frag,
              java.lang.String resultsFileName,
              int firstQuery,
              int lastQuery,
              java.lang.String forPrint)
        参数:
        index - the Index to be evaluated
        query - the Table to query the index with.
        minRadius - the minimum range query radius to run
        maxRadius - the maximum range query radius to run
        step - the increament unit of the range query radius
        verify - if true, search results of each query will be verified by a linear scan
        debug - decide how much execution log will be output, 0 means nothing.
        pathLength -
        frag -
        resultsFileName - the name of the file to save the results to.

    • 方法详细资料

      • evaluate

        public void evaluate(java.util.List<IndexObject> resultList,
            java.util.List<IndexMapReduce.radiusData> queryRadiusData)
        the primary method to do the evaluation. It first run the queries for each query, during which the statistics are set, then output.
